text: Lisa George (born 15 October 1970) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Beth Tinker in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2011â€“2024). In 2020, George competed in the twelfth series of Dancing on Ice. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Lincolnshire
